roleset.name: absence of a feature; disconfirmed
roleset.note: NEGATIVE-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. No VN class. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from negative.01-j)
NEG-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP (from neg.01-j)

role.descr: thing disconfirmed; thing that is absent

example.name: with both
example.text: Single left renal artery is negative for significant stenosis.

example.name: both args
example.text: Exam is otherwise negative for pathology.

example.name: both args
example.text: Family history was negative in all cases

roleset.name: not desirable, unwanted, bad
roleset.note: NEGATIVE-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. No VN class. FN class attitude_description. Framed by Katie. (from negative.02-j)

role.descr: malefactive; person hurt by negative events or situation

example.name: Both args
example.text: My experiences with him have always been negative.

example.name: Both args
example.text: An advocate can protect the patient from a drug with which prior interactions have been negative.

example.name: Both args
example.text: Shared leadership may also lessen the negative impact of principal turnover.

example.name: Both args
example.text: is a conservative media a net negative for the conservative movement?

example.name: different than negative.01 because it means a 'bad evaluation'
example.text: Why is the western media so negative about Russia

example.name: neg-v
example.text: He negged the seller for slow service.

example.name: AMR-style instance
example.text: Some point out Steinbeck's negative portrayal of female characters

example.name: no arg1
example.text: The candidate ran a very negative ad

roleset.name: be less than zero; go in a direction opposite of positive

role.descr: quantity, value or rate which is less than zero

example.name: Both args
example.text: Don't be fooled by negative interest rates

roleset.name: electronegativity; have a surplus of electrons
roleset.note: NEGATIVE-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No comparison. No VN class. FN class attitude_description. Framed by Katie. (from negative.02-j)

example.name: Both args
example.text: a negative ion is called an anion.

roleset.name: make invalid, counteract
roleset.note: NEGATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'negate' based on whole corpus; nominal 'negation' based on BOLT-6. (from negate.01-v)
NEGATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from negation.01-n)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The company said that [improved results in its financial-services sector]-1 were negated *trace*-1 by increased costs in its government contract business, lower operating earnings in its commercial-products sector and soft automotive markets.
example.arg: by increased costs in its government contract business, lower operating earnings in its commercial-products sector and soft automotive markets

example.name: nominal rel: negation
example.text: This remark by Committee Member Xu , which affirmed the important significance of cultural construction for nation - building and at the same time also provided a negation of the fallacy of some people 's taking " a country with a strong culture is making lots of money through culture " out of context , is worthy of praise .
example.arg: of the fallacy of some people 's taking " a country with a strong culture is making lots of money through culture " out of context
